name: I Just Fall In Love Again
content: Or am I really lying here with you
或者我真的和你躺在一起
Baby ' you take me in your arms
I know my dream is coming true
And though I just fall in love again
仅仅一次的触碰，它会每天发生
I just fall in love again
和你在一起，就如在天空飞翔
当我看着你，就如来到天堂
And though I just fall in love again
仅仅一次的触碰，它会每天发生
I just fall in love again
